message.name: ERR_RV_NO_VALID_ISSUE_TYPE_FOUND_SUBJECT
message.locale: An issue has been identified on case %1s of type %2s for %3s.

message.name: ERR_RV_NO_VALID_ISSUE_TYPE_FOUND_BODY
message.locale: An issue has been identified on case %1s of type %2s for %3s, but issue types have not been configured in administration. Issue types must be configured before issues can be created.
